Destruction.description: Helps you deal powerful damage and exert force against enemies

common_powers.name: Night Time
common_powers.icon_description: Four-pointed star within a circle with upward arrow
common_powers.effect: Increases Ability Power by 2 / 4 / 6 / 8

common_powers.name: Aggressive Stance
common_powers.icon_description: Sword with feathered wings extending from hilt
common_powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 2 / 4 / 6 / 8

common_powers.name: Crimson Flame
common_powers.icon_description: Rising flame or burning ember
common_powers.effect: Increase Burn damage by 30% / 35% / 40% / 45%

common_powers.name: Hurricane
common_powers.icon_description: Dynamic swirling spiral or vortex
common_powers.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 6% / 7.5% / 9% / 10.5%

common_powers.name: Lucky Clover
common_powers.icon_description: Classic four-leaf clover symbol
common_powers.effect: Increases Critical Strike Chance by 5% / 7% / 9% / 11% / 13%

common_powers.name: Valiant Challenger
common_powers.icon_description: Two curved swords crossed in X shape
common_powers.effect: Increases all damage dealt to Bosses by 10% / 12% / 14% / 16%

common_powers.name: Ultimate Malice
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized human skull
common_powers.effect: Increases Ultimate charge speed by 20% / 25% / 30% / 35% / 40%

common_powers.name: Destructive Nature
common_powers.icon_description: Tightly clenched fist
common_powers.effect: Gain 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 Attack Damage each time you reach levels 5, 10, 15, and 20

common_powers.name: Mature Mind
common_powers.icon_description: Human silhouette within target/compass symbol
common_powers.effect: Gain 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 Ability Power each time you reach levels 5, 10, 15, and 20

common_powers.name: Awakened Magic
common_powers.icon_description: Rolled-up scroll or parchment
common_powers.effect: Increases Ability Power by 14 / 16 / 18 / 20 while completing the first 3 worlds
common_powers.condition: Active while completing the first 3 worlds

common_powers.name: Daylight
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized sun with radiating rays
common_powers.effect: Your Light damage against enemies exposed to Light is increased by an additional 1.5% / 2% / 2.5% / 3% per stack
common_powers.condition: Requires enemies to be exposed to Light (stacks)

common_powers.name: Gathering Storm
common_powers.icon_description: Swirling tornado or whirlwind
common_powers.effect: Attack Speed is reduced by 10%. Attack Speed increases by 1% / 1.2% / 1.4% / 1.6% each time you level up

common_powers.name: Burning Bloodlust
common_powers.icon_description: Knife with three drops of liquid (blood) dripping
common_powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 14 / 16 / 18 / 20 until you complete the first 3 worlds
common_powers.condition: Active until you complete the first 3 worlds

common_powers.name: Corrupted Mind
common_powers.icon_description: Human brain with lightning bolt striking it
common_powers.effect: Your Dark damage against enemies exposed to Dark is increased by an additional 1.5% / 2% / 2.5% / 3% per stack
common_powers.condition: Requires enemies to be exposed to Dark (stacks)

common_powers.name: Strength Enhancement
common_powers.icon_description: Flexed bicep or arm muscle
common_powers.effect: Reduces Attack Speed by 20%. Increases Attack Damage by 8 / 10 / 12 / 15

common_powers.name: Elementalist
common_powers.icon_description: Classic Yin-Yang symbol
common_powers.effect: All damage you deal to enemies affected by all 4 elements is increased by 18% / 20% / 22% / 24%
common_powers.condition: Requires enemies to be affected by all 4 elements

common_powers.name: Powerful Blow
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized feathered projectile or burst of energy
common_powers.effect: Increases Critical Strike Damage by 15% / 18% / 21% / 24%

powers.name: Purpose of My Existence
powers.icon_description: Glowing reddish-pink jagged or claw-like symbol
powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 4 / 6 / 8 / 10

powers.name: Dance of Death
powers.icon_description: Glowing pinkish-red icon depicting stylized skull
powers.effect: Increases Critical Strike Damage by 15% / 20% / 25% / 30%

powers.name: Merciless
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink stylized mask or face icon, glowing faintly
powers.effect: All damage dealt to enemies with Health below 35% is increased by 15% / 18% / 21% / 24%
powers.lore: To one devoid of emotion, showing mercy to enemies is nothing but the height of inefficiency.

powers.name: Soul Oil
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink stylized symbol resembling three drops or flames
powers.effect: Your Maximum Health is reduced by 15%, but your Attack Speed increases by 8% / 12% / 16% and your basic attacks deal Dark damage
powers.bonus: Attack Speed increased, basic attacks deal Dark damage

powers.name: Soul Acceleration
powers.icon_description: Glowing pinkish-red icon resembling stylized flame, wing, or abstract energy swirl
powers.effect: The Cooldown of all Dash and Teleport Memories is reduced by 10% / 20% / 30%

powers.name: Premium Gunpowder
powers.icon_description: Stylized brain or cloud icon
powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 4 / 7 / 10

powers.name: Lizard's Intellect
powers.icon_description: Stylized lizard or dragon head
powers.effect: Increases Ability Power by 4 / 7 / 10

powers.name: Loading Mastery
powers.icon_description: Stylized open hand with five fingers
powers.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 6% / 10% / 14%

powers.name: Improvised Scope
powers.icon_description: Circular icon with target-like symbol (crosshair)
powers.effect: Increases Attack Range by 0.5 / 1 / 1.5 m

powers.name: Astrid's Smithing
powers.icon_description: Anvil with hammer resting on it
powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12
powers.lore: A younger sister's earnest prayers for her elder sister's safety are infused into the blade along with the sound of tempering.

powers.name: Strike the Weakness!
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink spiky star-like or burst icon
powers.effect: After dash or teleport, gain 5 / 8 / 11 Attack Damage and 10% / 15% / 20% Critical Strike Chance for 2.5 seconds

powers.name: Duelist's Focus
powers.icon_description: Stylized red winged spear or dagger
powers.effect: When your Health is above 90%, all damage dealt to any Boss is increased by 20% / 25% / 30% / 35%

powers.name: Dream-Infused Saber
powers.icon_description: Sword with glowing pinkish-red hilt and blade
powers.effect: Gain 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 Attack Damage each time you reach levels 5, 10, 15, and 20

powers.name: Finally, A Worthy Opponent
powers.icon_description: Stylized pink or red shield-like icon
powers.effect: All damage dealt to Hunters is increased by 20% / 25% / 30%
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 30 with Mist, costs 60 gems
powers.lore: She has never lost a single duel, whether secret or official.

powers.name: Starry Sky Tapestry
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink circular icon with white crescent moon and three small white stars
powers.effect: Increases Ability Power by 5 / 7 / 9 / 11

powers.name: Dazzling Meteor
powers.icon_description: Glowing pink stylized meteor with tail moving diagonally
powers.effect: Gain 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 Ability Power each time you reach levels 5, 10, 15, and 20

powers.name: Stellar Flow
powers.icon_description: Pinkish-red icon depicting crescent moon with small star inside
powers.effect: Increases Memory Haste by 5 / 8 / 11 / 15

powers.name: Starlit Gaze
powers.icon_description: Light pinkish-red stylized multi-pointed star or flower
powers.effect: Gain 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 Ability Power for each Light damage Memory you possess
powers.condition: Scales with number of Light damage Memories possessed

powers.name: Singularity Reversal
powers.icon_description: Pink stylized circular fan or propeller-like symbol with six blades radiating from central point
powers.effect: Casting Dodge grants 12% / 14% / 16% Ability Power for 2 seconds

powers.name: Eclipse
powers.icon_description: Stylized crescent moon or claw mark glowing with pinkish-orange hue
powers.effect: Gain Ability Power equal to 25% / 35% / 45% of your Attack Damage

powers.name: Starlit Eyes
powers.icon_description: Stylized pink icon resembling eye or star
powers.effect: Increases all damage dealt to enemies with 5 or more stacks of Light by 10% / 15% / 20%
powers.condition: Requires enemies to have 5 or more stacks of Light

powers.name: Glass Cannon
powers.icon_description: Pink/red stylized icon resembling atom or starburst
powers.effect: Gain 5 / 7 / 9 Attack Damage and 7 / 10 / 13 Ability Power, but your Maximum Health is reduced by 15%
powers.lore: His body is now nothing more than a fragile vessel. Of course, everyone who thought so has been reduced to a handful of dust.

powers.name: Pulverizer
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink spiky organic or crystalline shape (explosion, star, or weapon impact)
powers.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 9% / 11% / 13% / 15%
powers.lore: His sacred hammer is perfectly suited for pounding someone into submission.

powers.name: Solar Praise
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink icon resembling stylized sun or starburst
powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 10% / 13% / 16% / 20% when there are campfires, lava, or burning enemies or allies nearby
powers.condition: Requires campfires, lava, or burning enemies/allies nearby

powers.name: Hammer of Divinity
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink icon of stylized hammer
powers.effect: Gain Attack Damage equal to 25% / 30% / 35% / 40% of your Ability Power

powers.name: Reckless Fury
powers.icon_description: Red or pink flame or burst of energy icon
powers.effect: Maximum Health is reduced by 20% but Attack Speed is increased by 10% / 20% / 30%

powers.name: Grand Purpose
powers.icon_description: Circular icon with stylized sun or gear design in reddish-pink
powers.effect: Maximum Health is reduced by 10% but Light damage and Fire damage dealt to Bosses and Hunters is increased by 20% / 25% / 30%
powers.bonus: Light and Fire damage increased to Bosses and Hunters

powers.name: Hypothesis Formation
powers.icon_description: Circular icon with pinkish-red swirl or spiral design
powers.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 5% / 10% / 15%

powers.name: Experiment and Validation
powers.icon_description: Glowing pink icon depicting laboratory flask or beaker with bubbling liquid inside
powers.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 3 / 6 / 9
powers.lore: Experiments and validation must always be thorough. The pain or lives of test subjects are merely secondary considerations to her.

powers.name: Drawing a Conclusion
powers.icon_description: Stylized pink-red icon resembling brain or complex multi-lobed gear
powers.effect: Increases Ability Power by 3 / 6 / 9

powers.name: Resonance Effect
powers.icon_description: Stylized reddish-pink icon resembling gear or atom symbol
powers.effect: When your Health is below 50%, your Attack Damage and Ability Power increase by 8% / 10% / 12% / 14%

powers.name: Speed Reading
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink stylized hourglass
powers.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 9% / 11% / 13% / 15%

powers.name: Mental Attunement
powers.icon_description: Stylized brain glowing with pinkish-purple light with medical caduceus symbol (staff with two snakes intertwined) piercing through it
powers.effect: Gain 1 stack of Attunement with each basic attack, up to 8 stacks. Each stack increases your Attack Damage and Ability Power by 0.5 / 1 / 1.5. All stacks are lost when you take damage from enemies
powers.penalty: All stacks lost when taking damage from enemies

powers.name: Enlightenment
powers.icon_description: Glowing pinkish-red lightbulb icon
powers.effect: Each time you dismantle a Memory or Essence, your Attack Speed increases permanently by 3% / 4% / 5%, but Dream Dust gained is reduced by 35%. Attack Speed increase varies by rarity: 70%, 100%, 150%, 300%

powers.name: Arrow of the Mind
powers.icon_description: Stylized reddish-pink arrow pointing upwards and slightly to the right
powers.effect: Your Maximum Health is reduced by 15%, but in return, your basic attacks have a 25% / 50% / 75% chance to fire an additional arrow that triggers an attack effect
powers.bonus: Chance to fire additional arrow that triggers attack effect

powers.name: Self-Writing Story
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink icon of open book with quill pen resting on it
powers.effect: Increases Memory Haste by 8 / 12 / 16 / 20 and most Memories will be automatically cast during combat
powers.bonus: Most Memories automatically cast during combat
powers.lore: Sometimes, the story gets so exciting that it turns to the next page all by itself. The girl simply needs to sit back and watch the wonderful tales the book writes unfold.

powers.name: Dog Lover
powers.icon_description: Stylized icon of dog's head facing right, rendered in glowing pinkish-red color
powers.effect: When a canine monster or summon dies nearby, Nachia becomes enraged for 5 seconds, increasing her Attack Speed by 15% / 25% / 35%. However, Nachia's damage to canine monsters is reduced by 30%
powers.trigger: When a canine monster or summon dies nearby
powers.penalty: Damage to canine monsters reduced by 30%
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 20 with Nachia, costs 50 gems
powers.lore: She believes there are no bad dogs in this world.

powers.name: Enhanced Ferocity
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink icon depicting stylized devil or demon head with small horns, sharp teeth, and menacing expression
powers.effect: Increases the Attack Speed of all summons by 9% / 12% / 15% / 18%
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 30 with Nachia, costs 60 gems

Life.description: Hold the power to aid survival and support allies

common_powers.name: Empowered Persistence
common_powers.icon_description: Heart with cross symbol inside
common_powers.effect: Increases Maximum Health by 60 / 80 / 100 / 120

common_powers.name: Asclepius
common_powers.icon_description: Caduceus (staff with two snakes entwined and wings at top)
common_powers.effect: Increases the chance for a Health Potion to appear by 25% / 50% / 75% / 100%

common_powers.name: Unconditional Love
common_powers.icon_description: Two stylized overlapping leaves or wings forming heart-like shape
common_powers.effect: Reduces the cost of Shrine of Guidance by 25% / 50% / 75% / 100%

common_powers.name: Second Wind
common_powers.icon_description: Heart with pulse line or electrocardiogram (ECG) line through it
common_powers.effect: When you take Fatal damage, you ignore that damage and become Invulnerable for 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 seconds. This can only occur once per game.

common_powers.name: Suspicious Mixture
common_powers.icon_description: Flask or beaker with liquid inside
common_powers.effect: Increases the healing amount of Health Potions by 55% / 65% / 75% / 85%

common_powers.name: Stone Skin
common_powers.icon_description: Faceted gem or crystal
common_powers.effect: Increases Armor by 5 / 6.5 / 8 / 9.5 / 11

common_powers.name: Combat First Aid
common_powers.icon_description: Hand wearing glove or bandage
common_powers.effect: Restore 1.00% / 1.50% / 2.00% / 2.50% of your Max Health whenever you kill an enemy

common_powers.name: Steel Refinement
common_powers.icon_description: Rectangular bar or ingot
common_powers.effect: Increases Maximum Health by 15 / 18 / 21 / 24 each time you level up

common_powers.name: Elemental Resistance
common_powers.icon_description: Downward-pointing triangle with stylized wings or protrusions on upper sides
common_powers.effect: Reduces the duration of elemental effects on you by 40% / 45% / 50% / 55%. For Burn, damage is reduced instead.
common_powers.special_note: For Burn, damage is reduced instead of duration

common_powers.name: Regenerative Skin
common_powers.icon_description: Circular target or crosshair with plus sign in center
common_powers.effect: Increases received Healing and Barrier amounts by 12% / 14% / 16% / 18%

common_powers.name: Cold Affinity
common_powers.icon_description: Snowflake
common_powers.effect: Damage taken from enemies afflicted with Chill is reduced by 25% / 30% / 35% / 40%
common_powers.condition: Requires enemies to be afflicted with Chill

common_powers.name: Wicked Vitality
common_powers.icon_description: Two crossed swords or blades with heart in center
common_powers.effect: Basic Attacks restore 0.40% / 0.50% / 0.60% / 0.70% of your Max Health on hit. This healing is increased by 150% on a Critical Strike.
common_powers.bonus: Healing increased by 150% on Critical Strike

common_powers.name: Threat Detection
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized human figure with radiating lines around head (suggesting communication or aura)
common_powers.effect: Reduces Dodge's cooldown by 10% / 14% / 18% / 22%

common_powers.name: Instinctive Movement
common_powers.icon_description: Microscope
common_powers.effect: When Health is below 50%, Dodge cooldown is reduced by 20% / 24% / 28% / 32%

common_powers.name: Ragged Armor
common_powers.icon_description: Chest plate or armor piece
common_powers.effect: Gain 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4 Armor every time you enter a new world

common_powers.name: Humble Freebie
common_powers.icon_description: Wrapped gift box with plus sign on top
common_powers.effect: Gain a Health Potion when you buy or sell an item at the shop. This can trigger up to 1 / 2 / 3 times per merchant.
common_powers.trigger: Buy or sell item at shop

powers.name: Life Neglect
powers.icon_description: Pinkish-red stylized icon of shell with small glowing white four-pointed star or sparkle on its upper right side
powers.effect: Reduces healing received by 30%, but when a Critical Strike lands, it deals additional damage equal to 15% / 20% / 25% / 30% of the damage over 2 seconds

powers.name: Emergency Repair
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow-green icon depicting stylized wrench crossed with hammer
powers.effect: When you take Fatal damage, you ignore that damage and become Invulnerable for 1 / 2 / 3 seconds, but your Maximum Health is reduced by 15%. This can only occur once per game
powers.limitation: Can only occur once per game

powers.name: Flexible Lizard
powers.icon_description: Stylized lizard or gecko icon
powers.effect: Using Dodge increases your Movement Speed by 20% / 25% / 30% for 1.5 seconds
powers.lore: The Lizardman's remarkably flexible body is a tremendous asset in maintaining effective firing angles in any situation.

powers.name: Lizard Oil
powers.icon_description: Light yellow-green droplet icon
powers.effect: Dodge skill's cooldown increases by 1.5 / 1 / 0.5 seconds, but it gains 1 additional charge

powers.name: Honey-Glazed Fruit
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow cluster of berries or grapes
powers.effect: Health Potions grant a Barrier equal to 50% / 100% / 150% of the healing provided

powers.name: Plate Pauldrons
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow-green chest plate or pauldrons
powers.effect: Your Armor is increased by 15 / 25 / 35 / 45, but this effect disappears for 8 seconds when you take damage from enemies
powers.penalty: Effect disappears for 8 seconds when taking damage from enemies

powers.name: Light as a Feather
powers.icon_description: Light yellow/green feather icon
powers.effect: Movement Speed is increased by 3% / 6% / 9% / 12%. When your Health is above 90%, this effect is increased by 50%

powers.name: Light Armament
powers.icon_description: Stylized golden running figure
powers.effect: Damage taken from enemies is increased by 25% / 15% / 5%, but you gain 1 additional charge for your Dodge
powers.penalty: Damage taken increased (reduces as level increases)

powers.name: Balestra
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow butterfly icon
powers.effect: Your Dodge has 1 fewer maximum charge, but its cooldown is reduced by 0.8 / 1.4 / 2 seconds
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 30 with Mist, costs 60 gems

powers.name: Now You See Me
powers.icon_description: Glowing light yellow-green icon depicting stylized eye within circular shape
powers.effect: The travel distance of Dodge is increased by 33%

powers.name: Peek-a-boo!
powers.icon_description: Bright glowing yellow icon resembling stylized star or sun with multiple rays
powers.effect: Dodge's cooldown is reduced by 0.8 seconds, but its travel distance is reduced by 40% / 30% / 20%
powers.penalty: Travel distance reduced (reduces as level increases)

powers.name: Stellar Trace
powers.icon_description: Glowing light green footprint icon
powers.effect: Gain 1 additional charge for Dodge, but its cooldown is increased by 2 / 1.5 / 1 seconds

powers.name: Trial Survivor
powers.icon_description: Glowing gold icon of stylized helmet (Spartan or warrior's helmet)
powers.effect: Increases Armor by 6 / 8 / 10 / 12
powers.lore: The Order made him walk barefoot through blazing fire and scoop up boiling oil with his bare hands.

powers.name: Tough Skin
powers.icon_description: Glowing light yellow-green stylized heart icon
powers.effect: Increases Maximum Health by 80 / 100 / 120 / 140

powers.name: Marvelous Muscles
powers.icon_description: Bright yellow-green icon depicting flexing bicep
powers.effect: Increases Maximum Health by 15 / 20 / 25 each time you level up

powers.name: Rising Faith
powers.icon_description: Glowing golden icon depicting figure in kneeling or praying posture
powers.effect: Gain 2 / 3 / 4 Armor each time you reach level 5, 10, 15, and 20

powers.name: Heavy Armor Mastery
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow icon depicting chest plate
powers.effect: Increases the Barrier amount of Heavy Strike by 45% / 55% / 65% / 75% and extends its duration by 75% / 100% / 125% / 150%

powers.name: I Shall Not Waver!
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow-green icon depicting upward-facing hand with fingers spread (protective/shielding gesture)
powers.effect: When Health is below 35%, gain 10 / 20 / 30 Armor

powers.name: No Armor Is Too Thick
powers.icon_description: Glowing light yellow icon depicting stylized chest armor piece
powers.effect: Reduces Movement Speed by 20%, but increases Maximum Health by 14% / 17% / 20%

powers.name: Heart of the Sun
powers.icon_description: Shield-shaped icon with stylized flame inside, glowing with light yellow outline
powers.effect: Reduces Fire damage taken by 30% / 50% / 70% and Burn damage over time taken by 50% / 75% / 90%
powers.note: Reduces both Fire damage and Burn DoT

powers.name: Eel-like Agility
powers.icon_description: Glowing green stylized icon of eel or snake
powers.effect: When you take damage, your Movement Speed increases by 10% / 15% / 20% / 25% for 2 seconds
powers.lore: Her graceful and elegant movements, uncharacteristic of a scholar, are one of the physical traits of Anguillians.

powers.name: Autophagy
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow-gold circular icon with thinner concentric circle inside (stylized eye or 'O')
powers.effect: Increases healing given and received by 15% / 25% / 35% when your Health is below 50%

powers.name: Beautiful Plumage
powers.icon_description: Glowing light yellow-green icon depicting stylized feather
powers.effect: Increases Armor by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12

powers.name: Feather Oil
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow icon depicting stylized flask or vial with single drop falling from its opening
powers.effect: Increases Armor by 30 / 35 / 40 when your Health is below 40%

powers.name: Circulating Life
powers.icon_description: Glowing green icon resembling stylized heart with circular arrow or swirl encompassing it
powers.effect: When you recover Health, heal a nearby ally other than yourself with the lowest Health for 20% / 30% / 40% of the amount healed
powers.target: Nearby ally with lowest Health (excluding self)

powers.name: Experimental Hypothesis
powers.icon_description: Glowing light green icon resembling interconnected nodes or molecules
powers.effect: Increases damage taken from enemies by 20%, but increases healing given and received by 15% / 20% / 25% / 30%

powers.name: Two Souls
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow icon depicting two stylized humanoid figures standing side-by-side
powers.effect: When you take Fatal damage, you ignore that damage and become Invulnerable for 1 / 2 / 3 seconds. However, a random Memory is destroyed, and Identity Memories may also be destroyed. This can only occur once per game
powers.penalty: Random Memory destroyed, Identity Memories may also be destroyed
powers.limitation: Can only occur once per game

powers.name: Light Footsteps
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow icon depicting stylized foot or boot with wing-like element attached to heel
powers.effect: While moving, Movement Speed gradually increases over 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%. This bonus disappears when you stop moving
powers.note: Bonus disappears when you stop moving
powers.lore: Worried about the girl's tiny bare feet? Don't be. She's not walking on rough ground—she's skipping merrily across fluffy clouds on her journey!

powers.name: Guardian of Order
powers.icon_description: Small glowing pinkish-red icon of stylized tree
powers.effect: Increases Ability Power by 4 / 6 / 8 / 10
powers.lore: The order of the forest is simple and clear: life, death, and the cycle.

powers.name: Steadfast Bond
powers.icon_description: Glowing green paw print icon
powers.effect: When Nachia's summons are nearby, her Armor increases by 6 / 9 / 12 / 15 and the healing and Barrier she gives to her summons increase by 15% / 25% / 35% / 45%
powers.bonus: Armor increased, healing and Barrier to summons increased

powers.name: Life is Sacred
powers.icon_description: Golden-yellow icon resembling stylized plant or small tree with three leaves
powers.effect: Increases the healing and Barrier you give to yourself by 5% / 10% / 15%, and to allies by 15% / 20% / 25%

Imagination.description: Supports life and combat in The Rapids through unusual and often creative means

common_powers.name: Initial Capital
common_powers.icon_description: Money bag with small four-pointed star cursor icon overlaid
common_powers.effect: Gain 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 Gold at the start of your adventure

common_powers.name: Wealth Accumulation
common_powers.icon_description: Treasure chest
common_powers.effect: Increases the amount of Gold gained from defeating enemies by 4% / 6% / 8% / 10%

common_powers.name: Efficient Extraction
common_powers.icon_description: Mushroom-like shape with liquid dripping from cap
common_powers.effect: Increases the amount of Dream Dust gained from dismantling Memories or Essences by 7% / 9% / 11% / 13% / 15%

common_powers.name: Sharp Negotiator
common_powers.icon_description: Two open hands, palms up, with small glowing particles or seeds falling into them
common_powers.effect: The Gold price of items sold by Merchants is reduced by 10% / 12% / 14% / 16% / 18%

common_powers.name: Primordial Chaos
common_powers.icon_description: Target symbol or stylized eye with concentric circles
common_powers.effect: When Chaos is obtained as a reward, there is a 12% / 14% / 16% / 18% / 20% chance to gain one additional Chaos
common_powers.trigger: When Chaos is obtained as a reward

common_powers.name: Intersecting Memories
common_powers.icon_description: Swirling triple-spiral vortex design
common_powers.effect: Acquire a random level 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 Memory at the start of your adventure
common_powers.note: Memory level scales with power level

common_powers.name: Monstrous Charm
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized eye with diamond-shaped pupil and small circle in center
common_powers.effect: There is a 50% / 75% / 100% chance for Jonas to offer 2 additional items for sale

common_powers.name: Beginner's Luck
common_powers.icon_description: Diamond shape
common_powers.effect: Increases the quality of the first Essence you equip by 40% / 70% / 100% / 130%

common_powers.name: Dismantle and Analyze
common_powers.icon_description: Small cloud with three glowing stars rising above it
common_powers.effect: Defeating an enemy has a 12% / 14% / 16% / 18% chance to grant 2 Dream Dust

common_powers.name: Black Market
common_powers.icon_description: Diamond shape encircled by two curved arrows
common_powers.effect: Gain 1 / 2 / 3 Platinum Coins at the start of an adventure and whenever you move to a new world, up to a maximum of 3. Use these coins to refresh the Merchant's inventory.
common_powers.trigger: Start of adventure and moving to new world

common_powers.name: Pickpocket
common_powers.icon_description: Hand holding glowing orb or sphere
common_powers.effect: Gain 0.7 / 1 / 1.3 Gold the first time a Critical Attack hits each enemy
common_powers.trigger: First Critical Attack on each enemy

common_powers.name: Trading Fates
common_powers.icon_description: Three interconnected circles forming triangular pattern
common_powers.effect: The first time you Dismantle an Essence or Memory, it is replaced with a random item of the same rarity instead of being dismantled. Can trigger up to 1 / 2 / 3 times per world.
common_powers.note: Replaces dismantled item with random item of same rarity

common_powers.name: Sparkling Clean Maw
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized monster's mouth with sharp teeth
common_powers.effect: Reduces the cost of the Maw of Doom by 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%. The Maw no longer destroys items it consumes, instead resetting their level or quality.
common_powers.special_note: Maw no longer destroys items, resets level/quality instead

common_powers.name: Bizarre Spoils
common_powers.icon_description: Snowflake or starburst design with multiple points
common_powers.effect: Defeating a Mini Boss has a 40% / 60% / 80% / 100% chance to grant a random Essence

powers.name: Bounty
powers.icon_description: Glowing light blue icon depicting stylized money bag with coins spilling out
powers.effect: When you defeat a boss, you have a 30% / 60% chance to obtain a Platinum Coin. This coin can refresh the Merchant's inventory

powers.name: Creepy One-Eyed Doll
powers.icon_description: Glowing light blue stylized eye icon
powers.effect: Intimidate Merchants to lower item prices. If you succeed (50% chance), the Gold price is reduced by 50% / 60% / 70%. If you fail, it increases by 50%
powers.penalty: Gold price increased by 50% on failure
powers.lore: He believes intimidation is the most efficient and convenient method. Of course, it doesn't work on the braver Jonas.

powers.name: Skilled Negotiator
powers.icon_description: Two shaking hands icon
powers.effect: The Gold price of items sold by Merchants is reduced by 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%

powers.name: Northern Lizardman Bargaining
powers.icon_description: Light blue/cyan eye icon
powers.effect: The Gold price of items sold by some Merchants is increased by 50% / 40% / 30%, but they offer 2 additional items for sale

powers.name: Wild Monster Hunter
powers.icon_description: Light blue/cyan scroll icon
powers.effect: Gain an additional 45 / 60 / 75 Gold each time you defeat a Boss

powers.name: Rewarding Collection
powers.icon_description: Three crystals or shards icon
powers.effect: Breaking Gold Shards or Dream Dust Shards grants an additional 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 Gold and Dream Dust
powers.trigger: Breaking Gold Shards or Dream Dust Shards
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 30 with Lacerta, costs 40 gems

powers.name: Noble Lineage
powers.icon_description: Stylized light blue or cyan rose or flower
powers.effect: You begin your adventure with 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 Gold, but the Gold price of Merchant items is increased by 10%
powers.lore: Though the Verdesilver family has fallen, her nobility remains untarnished.

powers.name: Cat Lover
powers.icon_description: Light blue stylized cat facing right with tail curled upwards
powers.effect: Gain 800 / 1,200 Gold and 800 / 1,200 Dream Dust when petting a Cat

powers.name: Camilla's Gift
powers.icon_description: Light blue wrapped gift box with ribbon
powers.effect: You begin your adventure with Camilla's Gift. Camilla's Gift sells for 100 / 125 / 150 and increases in value by 200 / 250 / 300 each time you enter a new world. However, if enemy damage drops your health below 50%, the gift is destroyed.
powers.trigger: Start of adventure and entering new worlds
powers.penalty: Gift destroyed if health drops below 50% from enemy damage
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 30 with Mist, costs 60 gems
powers.lore: The kindness of her patron, Camilla, was never one-sided. Surely, she remains a cherished bond for Mist as well.

powers.name: Dream-born
powers.icon_description: Glowing light blue icon resembling inverted pentagram or five-pointed star enclosed in circle
powers.effect: When using the Shrine of Dismantling, gain additional Dream Dust equal to 50% / 100% / 150% of the Gold received as a reward
powers.lore: Knowing the truth and facing it are different matters. How would it feel to see a fairy tale with your own story written in it?

powers.name: Cookie Baker
powers.icon_description: Light blue glowing star icon
powers.effect: Defeating enemies has a 0.5% / 0.8% / 1.2% chance to create a Star Cookie. Star Cookies restore a small amount of Yubar's Health and grant a small amount of Gold and Dream Dust
powers.reward: Star Cookie (restores Health, grants Gold and Dream Dust)
powers.lore: He burned through an astronomical number of stars in pursuit of the perfect star cookie.

powers.name: God in a Fairy Tale
powers.icon_description: Light blue glowing icon depicting stylized winged creature (fairy or butterfly)
powers.effect: Your Maximum Health is reduced by 10%, but you gain 10% / 15% / 20% increased Dream Dust from all sources
powers.bonus: Dream Dust increased from all sources

powers.name: War Chest
powers.icon_description: Light blue/teal icon depicting stack of three coins, slightly offset from each other
powers.effect: Gain 100 / 150 / 200 Gold at the start of your adventure

powers.name: Overwhelming Presence
powers.icon_description: Stylized light blue flame-like or ethereal figure with outstretched arms (spirit or energy burst)
powers.effect: The Gold price of items sold by Merchants is reduced by 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
powers.lore: Everyone has a plan. That is, until they meet him face to face.

powers.name: Equivalent Exchange
powers.icon_description: Light blue (cyan) stylized icon of balance scale
powers.effect: Gain 10 / 15 / 20 Gold each time you acquire a Health Potion

powers.name: Fun Experiment
powers.icon_description: Light blue icon depicting two syringes crossed over each other
powers.effect: Gain 4 Gold each time you damage a Merchant, up to a maximum of 40 / 60 / 80 Gold
powers.note: 4 Gold per damage instance, capped at maximum
powers.lore: Aurena herself doesn't seem to see anything wrong with this.

powers.name: Component Analysis
powers.icon_description: Glowing light blue icon depicting stylized ingot or stack of bars
powers.effect: Increases the resources gained from Gold Shards and Dream Dust Shards by 40% / 50% / 60% / 70%
powers.target: Gold Shards and Dream Dust Shards

powers.name: Anguillian Hypersense
powers.icon_description: Light blue stylized icon resembling alien or octopus-like creature with two large eyes and two downward-curving tentacles
powers.effect: When entering a world, reveal 3 / 4 / 5 random locations

powers.name: Glittering Golden Antlers
powers.icon_description: Light blue icon of stylized deer head with antlers
powers.effect: Gain 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 Gold every time you enter a new world
powers.lore: With sandpaper, cloth, and time, you can always acquire a bit of Gold.

powers.name: I'm Adorable
powers.icon_description: Light blue icon featuring heart enclosed within circular arrow
powers.effect: The Gold price of items sold by Merchants is reduced by 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%

powers.name: Mind's Eye
powers.icon_description: Light blue/cyan icon depicting stylized eye with gear or cog-like iris
powers.effect: When entering a world, reveal 2 / 3 / 4 random locations
powers.lore: When the girl looked at the world through her book, gingerbread houses waiting with the next adventure would appear in places that had been empty before.

powers.name: Book of Knowledge
powers.icon_description: Glowing light blue icon depicting open book
powers.effect: Gain 1-4 Books of Knowledge for every boss you defeat. Each book grants a random stat equivalent to a Common-grade Chaos 15% / 20% / 25%
powers.bonus: Gain 1-4 Books of Knowledge per boss

powers.name: Good Material
powers.icon_description: Light blue glowing icon depicting stylized rectangular block or gem with internal facets
powers.effect: Increase the amount of Dream Dust obtained when dismantling Memories by 20% / 25% / 30% / 35%

powers.name: Beautiful Metal
powers.icon_description: Light blue/cyan stylized icon resembling crystal or shard
powers.effect: Start your adventure with the Metallic Crystal Essence. You can sell this Essence to Merchants for 200 / 300 / 400 Gold, or dismantle it for 120 / 160 / 200 Dream Dust. However, losing this shard will reduce your Maximum Health by 15%
powers.penalty: Losing shard reduces Maximum Health by 15%
powers.note: Provides Metallic Crystal Essence at adventure start

powers.name: Refreshing Morning Dew
powers.icon_description: Light blue stylized icon resembling water droplet or dewdrop
powers.effect: Gain 100 / 130 / 160 Dream Dust each time you visit the Forest of Turbulence

powers.name: Hunting Training
powers.icon_description: Light blue-green stylized icon depicting skull with two crossed bones beneath it
powers.effect: When a summon kills an enemy with a basic attack, there's a 25% chance to gain 2 / 3 / 4 additional Gold
powers.trigger: Summon kills enemy with basic attack

powers.name: Long Time No See! Miss Me?
powers.icon_description: Light blue four-leaf clover icon
powers.effect: The Gold price of items sold by merchants in the Forest of Turbulence is reduced by 30% / 40% / 50%
powers.target: Merchants in the Forest of Turbulence
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 20 with Nachia, costs 40 gems

powers.name: Reaping Life
powers.icon_description: Light blue stylized icon resembling small plant or tree with visible roots and branches
powers.effect: Increases Movement Speed by 8% / 10% / 12% in the Forest of Turbulence and grants 0.5 / 0.75 / 1 Dream Dust for each enemy killed
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 30 with Nachia, costs 60 gems

Flexible.description: Twists the Traveler's Memories in unique ways
Flexible.special_property: Flexible stars can be equipped in any slot without efficiency loss. They can be placed in any tree, and any other tree socketable powers can be placed in Flexible slots.

common_powers.name: TBD
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized human figure (bust) within circular outline

common_powers.name: TBD
common_powers.icon_description: Circular symbol with central dot and radiating lines (target or compass)

common_powers.name: TBD
common_powers.icon_description: Crescent moon shape with sharp pointed end (claw or blade)

common_powers.name: TBD
common_powers.icon_description: Hourglass

common_powers.name: TBD
common_powers.icon_description: Swirling abstract shape (vortex or energy)

common_powers.name: TBD
common_powers.icon_description: Stylized pot or vessel with lid (cauldron or lamp)

powers.name: Perceive, Learn, Adapt
powers.icon_description: Reddish-pink target-like symbol with compass rose inside
powers.effect: Gain 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3 Attack Damage and 3% / 4% / 5% / 6% Attack Speed each time you reach levels 5, 10, 15, and 20

powers.name: Gunpowder Propelled Leap
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow stylized icon of leaping figure with trailing effect
powers.effect: Flash Step's cooldown increases by 1 second, but its maximum charges increase by 1 and its travel distance increases by 10% / 20% / 30%

powers.name: Transcendence
powers.icon_description: Glowing light yellow-green icon depicting stylized figure in motion with speed lines
powers.effect: Flash Step cooldown is increased by 1 second. When you have no Flash Step charges and kill an enemy, its current cooldown is reduced by 40% / 70%
powers.trigger: Killing an enemy when Flash Step has no charges
powers.lore: A puppet's body freed from emotional chains, efficient and perfect movements, and the center of a sea of blood.

powers.name: Complete Immersion
powers.icon_description: Glowing yellow-green icon depicting two stylized theatrical masks (one smiling, one frowning)
powers.effect: When you kill an enemy or perform a basic attack on a boss, Flash Step's cooldown is reduced by 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
powers.trigger: Killing an enemy or performing basic attack on boss

powers.name: Flow of Energy
powers.icon_description: Small glowing white icon depicting stylized humanoid figure with aura or energy flowing around it
powers.effect: Laceration's cooldown increases by 1 second, but casting Red Form resets Flash Step's cooldown
powers.bonus: Casting Red Form resets Flash Step cooldown
powers.lore: He surrenders to the flow and takes his steps—flawless and detached.

powers.name: Precise Strike
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized comet or meteor with tail, striking downwards
powers.effect: If Laceration hits only one target, its cooldown is reduced by 30%

powers.name: Rapid Draw
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon resembling crescent moon or claw
powers.effect: Laceration's cooldown is reduced by 30% and Blue Form's cast time is reduced by 40%, but it no longer grants Invulnerability
powers.bonus: Laceration cooldown -30%, Blue Form cast time -40%

powers.name: Chained Bloodlust
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon resembling hourglass with stylized wing or blade extending from its side
powers.effect: During Annihilation Stance, each time your basic attack or sword energy hits an enemy, the duration increases by 0.2 seconds
powers.trigger: Basic attack or sword energy hits enemy

powers.name: Frenzied Blade Dance
powers.icon_description: White glowing icon resembling stylized multi-bladed weapon or swirling energy effect
powers.effect: Annihilation Stance no longer fires sword energy but attacks 100% more frequently

powers.name: Controlled Madness
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon depicting stylized abstract figure or symbol, possibly head with horns or crown, or chaotic energy form
powers.effect: Annihilation Stance becomes a regular ability with a 14 second cooldown. In this form, sword energy damage and attack damage bonuses are reduced by 40%. The stance lasts for 4 seconds and allows you to use other Memories while it is active
powers.penalty: Sword energy damage and attack damage bonuses reduced by 40%
powers.bonus: Becomes regular ability, allows use of other Memories while active
powers.lore: After becoming an empty shell devoid of soul, he was able to control himself even more perfectly.

powers.name: Barasus's Fury
powers.icon_description: White stylized dragon head icon
powers.effect: Increases the damage dealt by Hand Cannon to nearby enemies by 150%
powers.lore: He never forgot that overwhelming power he witnessed from afar. And finally, he recreated it with his own hands.

powers.name: Dirty Gunpowder
powers.icon_description: White comet or shooting star icon
powers.effect: Hand Cannon always knocks enemies back and reduces their Movement Speed by 75% for 4 seconds

powers.name: Explosive Ammunition
powers.icon_description: White target or crosshair icon
powers.effect: Incendiary Rounds explode, damaging nearby enemies

powers.name: Cartridge Belt
powers.icon_description: Stylized golden emblem icon
powers.effect: Incendiary Rounds's cooldown increases by 2 seconds, but the number of bullets fired also increases by 2

powers.name: Quick Reload
powers.icon_description: White stopwatch or timer icon
powers.effect: Quick Draw's cooldown increases by 3 seconds, but it now recharges all at once
powers.tradeoff: Cooldown +3s but recharges all at once

powers.name: Indiscriminate Barrage
powers.icon_description: White multi-pointed star or burst icon
powers.effect: Quick Draw's charge count is reduced by 1, but it fires 6 shots

powers.name: Dream Ammunition
powers.icon_description: White stylized projectile or bullet icon
powers.effect: Quick Draw triggers attack effects

powers.name: Seasoned Aim
powers.icon_description: White target or compass with four arrows icon
powers.effect: Precision Shot's charge speed increases by 33%

powers.name: No Such Thing as Overkill
powers.icon_description: White comet or shooting star icon
powers.effect: Precision Shot's charge speed decreases by 40%, but its damage increases by 50% and width by 30%
powers.stat_affected: Precision Shot charge speed, damage, and width
powers.tradeoff: Charge speed -40% but damage +50% and width +30%

powers.name: Special Operation
powers.icon_description: White eye icon with star in pupil
powers.effect: Precision Shot's width decreases by 60%, but killing an enemy with the shot resets the cooldown
powers.tradeoff: Width -60% but killing enemy resets cooldown

powers.name: Flow Reversal
powers.icon_description: White icon resembling stylized swirling vortex or fan blade
powers.effect: Ether's Influence no longer roots enemies but its explosion damage is increased by 50%

powers.name: Explosive Confidence
powers.icon_description: White stylized starburst or explosion icon
powers.effect: Ether's Influence's explosion radius is increased by 25%

powers.name: Unstable Ether
powers.icon_description: White glowing spiral icon resembling stylized vortex or galaxy
powers.effect: Ether's Influence's explosion damage is reduced by 60% and can no longer be detonated manually, but it now explodes automatically on hit
powers.tradeoff: Damage -60%, no manual detonation, but auto-explodes on hit

powers.name: Swift Casting
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon of bird or winged creature in flight
powers.effect: Casting Supernova resets the cooldown of Dodge

powers.name: Star Herding
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon resembling stylized plant sprout or star with stem
powers.effect: Supernova can no longer be manually detonated. Channeling is removed and it now automatically explodes when fully charged
powers.lore: Even without his attention, the stars grow fat on cosmic dust.

powers.name: Mortar
powers.icon_description: White glowing icon resembling stylized swirling star or vortex
powers.effect: Increases Supernova's cast range by 40% and explosion radius by 30%
powers.stat_affected: Supernova cast range and explosion radius

powers.name: Power Focus
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon depicting stylized human figure with radiating lines above head
powers.effect: Cataclysm's duration is increased by 50%

powers.name: Burning Meteor
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon depicting fiery meteor or comet with tail
powers.effect: The impact site of Cataclysm's meteor burns, dealing 100% of the meteor's damage to enemies over 2 seconds
powers.bonus: Burning effect dealing 100% meteor damage over 2 seconds

powers.name: Choosing Violence
powers.icon_description: White icon depicting stylized fist or starburst with fist in center
powers.effect: Cataclysm increases Yubar's Attack Damage and Attack Speed instead of Ability Power
powers.modification: Changes stat from Ability Power to Attack Damage and Attack Speed
powers.lore: He seems slightly irritated by mortals who keep confusing his gender.

powers.name: Flexible Thinking
powers.icon_description: White glowing icon resembling stylized brain or thought bubble with star inside
powers.effect: Tranquility's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds, but instead of becoming Invulnerable, you gain a Barrier equal to 100% of your Maximum Health that lasts for the duration of the Invulnerability
powers.tradeoff: Cooldown -2s but Invulnerability replaced with Barrier (100% Max Health)

powers.name: Song of Stars
powers.icon_description: White musical note icon (two eighth notes connected)
powers.effect: Tranquility's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds, but it also reduces the cooldowns of all essences
powers.tradeoff: Cooldown +2s but reduces all essence cooldowns

powers.name: Light Heart
powers.icon_description: Glowing white leaf-like icon
powers.effect: Tranquility's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds, but its Invulnerability duration is also reduced by 40%

powers.name: West Wind
powers.icon_description: White stylized winged symbol (single wing or pair of small wings)
powers.effect: Increases the cast range of Lunge by 33%

powers.name: Cutting Through Wind
powers.icon_description: Golden stylized swirling wind or blade with two curved pointed shapes rotating around central point
powers.effect: Lunge deals 50% reduced damage, but you gain 100% increased cooldown reduction when Astrid's Masterpiece triggers
powers.bonus: 100% increased cooldown reduction when Astrid's Masterpiece triggers

powers.name: Focused Strike
powers.icon_description: White stylized feather or sharp upward-pointing wing
powers.effect: Lunge now hits only a single target, but its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds and its damage is increased by 100%. It also knocks back enemies.
powers.stat_affected: Lunge target count, cooldown, damage, and effects
powers.tradeoff: Single target only but cooldown -1.5s, damage +100%, and knockback
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Mist, costs 120 gems

powers.name: Lightning Breath
powers.icon_description: White stylized lightning bolt
powers.effect: Flèche's damage is converted to Light damage, and you teleport instead of dashing

powers.name: Blooming Dream
powers.icon_description: White stylized lotus flower
powers.effect: Flèche comes with 2 fewer charges, but its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds

powers.name: Coup de Grâce
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon resembling stylized lamp or ornate structure with light emanating from top
powers.effect: When Flèche hits at maximum range, its damage is increased by 80% and it explodes, damaging a wide area
powers.stat_affected: Flèche damage and area of effect
powers.bonus: Damage +80% and explodes damaging wide area
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Mist, costs 120 gems

powers.name: Two Hearts
powers.icon_description: White icon of two overlapping hearts
powers.effect: Casting Unbreakable Determination restores 35% of missing Health

powers.name: Determined Explosion
powers.icon_description: Glowing white swirling vortex-like symbol
powers.effect: Unbreakable Determination's duration is reduced by 30%, but the initial explosion's damage is increased by 200%

powers.name: Wide Vision
powers.icon_description: White stylized snowflake or starburst with four arrows pointing outwards
powers.effect: Parry's cooldown is increased by 1.5 seconds, but you can parry attacks from all directions
powers.tradeoff: Cooldown +1.5s but can parry from all directions

powers.name: Charged Saber
powers.icon_description: White glowing stylized saber or sword with radiating lines
powers.effect: After successfully Parrying, your next attack becomes a critical strike, and you gain a shield equal to 250% of the parried damage that decays over 4 seconds. The shield's duration increases by 0.5 seconds each time you enhance Parry.
powers.bonus: Next attack becomes critical strike, shield = 250% of parried damage
powers.scaling: Shield duration +0.5s per Parry enhancement level

powers.name: The Best Offense is Defense
powers.icon_description: White stylized sword or dagger pointing upwards with horizontal lines across blade
powers.effect: Parry's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds, but the effective parry window is reduced by 40%
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Mist, costs 120 gems
powers.lore: She never rushes. The most crucial opportunity comes the moment her opponent strikes.

powers.name: Pride Flare
powers.icon_description: White stylized four-pointed star or compass rose icon with central circle in golden circular frame
powers.effect: Increases Cruel Sun's damage by 25% and allows you to move while channeling, but you no longer gain an Armor bonus
powers.lore: He believes himself closer to the divine than most. But to dismiss it as mere arrogance—he is far too powerful for that.

powers.name: Embers
powers.icon_description: White icon depicting stylized flame or campfire
powers.effect: The Unstoppable status and Armor bonus from Cruel Sun persist for 2.5 seconds after channeling ends
powers.stat_affected: Cruel Sun Unstoppable status and Armor bonus duration
powers.bonus: Unstoppable and Armor persist for 2.5s after channeling

powers.name: Cold Fury
powers.icon_description: White icon resembling stylized snowflake or ice crystal
powers.effect: Cruel Sun's damage is converted to Cold damage, the stun duration is increased by 2 seconds, and the Armor it grants is increased by 50%

powers.name: Reckless Leap
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon resembling bird or winged creature in flight
powers.note: Memory required by this star has not been unlocked (cost: 80 gems)

powers.name: Face-to-Face Judgment
powers.icon_description: White icon of stylized hammer
powers.note: Memory required by this star has not been unlocked (cost: 100 gems)

powers.name: Momentum
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized claw or lightning bolt icon
powers.note: Memory required by this star has not been unlocked (cost: 120 gems)

powers.name: A Touch of Altruism
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon depicting open hand with several small glowing particles or droplets falling from it
powers.effect: Summons El's Sanctuary at a target location instead of Vesper's position. The cooldown is reduced by 10% for each ally and 3% for each enemy hit by the initial blast
powers.stat_affected: El's Sanctuary summon location and cooldown
modifications: Cooldown reduction based on allies/enemies hit
powers.lore: Vesper has a surprisingly soft spot for children. Perhaps an echo of his own troubled childhood?

powers.name: Total Offensive
powers.icon_description: Two stylized white swords crossed over each other
powers.effect: Increases the Attack Speed bonus for allies affected by El's Sanctuary by 50%, and reduces the number of basic attacks needed to trigger the 4th basic attack effect by 1. Does not grant Barrier, Armor, or Unstoppable effects
powers.bonus: Attack Speed bonus +50%, basic attack trigger -1
powers.limitation: Does not grant Barrier, Armor, or Unstoppable effects

powers.name: Sacred Ground
powers.icon_description: White shield with cross symbol on it
powers.effect: Reduces El's Sanctuary's duration by 50%, but grants Invulnerability to allies
powers.stat_affected: El's Sanctuary duration and defensive effect
powers.tradeoff: Duration -50% but grants Invulnerability to allies

powers.name: Endless Hammering
powers.icon_description: White icon depicting stylized hammer with motion lines
powers.note: Memory required by this star has not been unlocked (cost: 80 gems)

powers.name: No Pain, No Gain
powers.icon_description: White spiky chaotic star or burst symbol with smaller darker circular core
powers.note: Memory required by this star has not been unlocked (cost: 100 gems)

powers.name: Invigorating Heat
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon resembling stylized star or small intricate symbol
powers.note: Memory required by this star has not been unlocked (cost: 120 gems)

powers.name: Strong Bond
powers.icon_description: White stylized DNA double helix icon enclosed within golden circular frame
powers.effect: If you cast Golden Explosion with no Wither stacks, no Health is sacrificed. This only applies in combat.

powers.name: Loose Dismantle
powers.icon_description: White stylized melting or dripping object (candle/blob) with three drips in golden circular frame
powers.effect: Golden Explosion's damage is reduced by 40%, but the Health sacrificed is also reduced by 30%

powers.name: Dismantle, Dissolve, Understanding
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized triangular or pyramid-like shape
powers.effect: If you cast Golden Explosion within 3 seconds after using Dodge, no Health is sacrificed. This only applies in combat.
powers.condition: Cast within 3 seconds after using Dodge

powers.name: Enhanced Dismantling Force
powers.icon_description: Circular white stylized gear or circular saw blade with central dot
powers.effect: Reduction fires 1 more Gold Shards, but the amount of Health sacrificed increases to 15%

powers.name: Sharp Shards
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized icon resembling sharp shard or pointed feather
powers.effect: Each Gold Shard from Reduction triggers attack effects on the first enemy hit
powers.bonus: Gold Shards trigger attack effects on first enemy hit

powers.name: Transmutation
powers.icon_description: White stylized circular icon with smaller central circle and two curved arrows forming continuous loop around it
powers.effect: Reduction no longer restores Health, but its cooldown is reduced by 70%

powers.name: Follow-up Research
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon of clipboard with pencil
powers.effect: Dangerous Theory's cooldown increases by 1 second and it can only be used as an empowered cast, but it empowers 2 basic attacks
powers.penalty: Cooldown +1s, can only be used as empowered cast

powers.name: Extremely Dangerous Theory
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon resembling sharp claw mark or lightning bolt
powers.effect: The Health threshold for empowered casts of Dangerous Theory is reduced to 40%, but healing is increased by 40%
powers.lore: The ethics committee of the Lunar Society that reviewed her thesis unanimously reached two conclusions. First, she should be immediately expelled. Second, all committee members who participated in this review shall be granted one week of paid leave.

powers.name: Unparalleled Genius
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized sun or starburst icon
powers.effect: When you cast Dangerous Theory, become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds and remove Delusional effects
powers.bonus: Become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds, remove Delusional effects
powers.lore: She now understands delusions completely, from their basic principles to how they work.

powers.name: Golden Mind
powers.icon_description: Glowing white-gold stylized brain or head in profile icon
powers.effect: Chain Reaction applies 70% healing to Travelers even if they are not inside the sigil

powers.name: Master Alchemist
powers.icon_description: White stylized multi-faceted hexagonal gem or star
powers.effect: Chain Reaction earns 2 Gold per second for each enemy inside the sigil
powers.bonus: 2 Gold per second per enemy inside sigil

powers.name: Golden Wind
powers.icon_description: Golden stylized drop or tear with white glowing core
powers.effect: Chain Reaction no longer heals, but its cooldown is reduced by 15% each time an enemy dies from the sigil
powers.trigger: Each time an enemy dies from the sigil

powers.name: Diverse Topics
powers.icon_description: White icon depicting open book with speech bubble above it
powers.effect: Each soul missile from Pure Soul gains a random elemental effect
powers.bonus: Soul missiles gain random elemental effect

powers.name: Undervolting
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon resembling comet or shooting star with fiery tail enclosed within circular shape
powers.effect: Pure Soul's soul missile count is reduced by 2, but its cooldown is reduced by 50%

powers.name: Say Hello to My Little Friends!
powers.icon_description: Small glowing white icon composed of three dots arranged in triangle
powers.effect: Pure Soul's cooldown increases by 1 second, but the number of soul missiles also increases by your attacks per second
powers.bonus: Soul missile count increases by attacks per second
powers.lore: The girl decided to divide her shining heart into even more pieces to give as gifts. Then everyone regained their kind hearts and quietly fell asleep!

powers.name: Furnace
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon depicting open book with flames rising from its pages
powers.effect: Tales of Hellfire's damage is reduced by 40% but now also hits enemies inside the ring
stat_affected: Tales of Hellfire area of effect
powers.bonus: Now also hits enemies inside the ring

powers.name: Extended Agony
powers.icon_description: White icon depicting skull with open book, outlined in gold
powers.effect: Tales of Hellfire's cooldown increases by 1 second, but each time it hits an enemy, its duration increases by 0.2 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 seconds
powers.trigger: Each time it hits an enemy

powers.name: Close and Personal
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon resembling two interlocking or expanding squares
powers.effect: Tales of Hellfire's ring radius is reduced by 35% but its damage is increased by 35%

powers.name: Steadfast Heart
powers.icon_description: White shield-like icon with V-shaped emblem inside, set against golden circular background
powers.effect: Valiant Heart's cooldown is increased by 1 second, but you gain a Barrier equal to 40% of the damage dealt that lasts for 2.5 seconds
powers.bonus: Barrier equal to 40% of damage dealt

powers.name: Quick Decision
powers.icon_description: White glowing icon resembling stylized wrench or crescent-shaped blade
powers.effect: Using Distorting Sprint resets the cooldown of Valiant Heart, but it only hits up to 2 enemies

powers.name: No Longer Afraid
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon depicting stylized hand holding small glowing four-pointed star or crystal
powers.effect: Valiant Heart's charges now fully restore all at once
powers.modification: Charges fully restore all at once
powers.lore: Now, no matter how many villains appear, it's okay. The girl's hands will always be filled with the courage to defeat them!

powers.name: Overcharge
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon resembling stylized lightning bolt or upward-pointing arrow with horizontal line across its base
powers.effect: Increases Distorted Mind's cooldown by 1 second, but firing at maximum charge increases the number of arrows by 2
powers.bonus: Firing at maximum charge increases arrows by 2

powers.name: Improvisation
powers.icon_description: Glowing white double-arrow symbol pointing to the right, enclosed within subtle circular glow
powers.effect: When you release Distorted Mind without fully charging, its cooldown is reduced by 50%

powers.name: Artillery
powers.icon_description: White glowing icon depicting three stylized arrows or projectiles flying diagonally upwards and to the right with small starburst effect
powers.effect: Increases the maximum number of arrows for Distorted Mind by 7, but you cannot move while charging

powers.name: More Hounds!
powers.icon_description: White paw print icon
powers.effect: The duration of Sylvan Call Leaf Hounds is reduced by 3 seconds, but the maximum charge count increases by 1 and the maximum number of summons also increases by 1

powers.name: Accelerated Life
powers.icon_description: White stylized leaf or plant sprout icon in circular outline
powers.effect: Leaf Hounds from Sylvan Call have a shorter duration by 3 seconds, but their Attack Speed increases by 50% for 5 seconds after being summoned
powers.bonus: Attack Speed +50% for 5 seconds after being summoned

powers.name: Sharp Claws
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized claw or talon icon
powers.effect: The Leaf Hounds from Sylvan Call trigger 30% attack effects with their basic attacks
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Nachia, costs 120 gems
powers.lore: Regular nail trimming is essential for any good dog.

powers.name: Death Waltz
powers.icon_description: White stylized skull with crown or elaborate headpiece, glowing slightly
powers.effect: Moonlight Pact's charge count increases by 1, but on cast, Fenrir instantly slashes a wide circular area instead of leaping
powers.modification: Fenrir instantly slashes wide circular area instead of leaping

powers.name: Pact of Destiny
powers.icon_description: White glowing icon depicting crescent moon partially obscured by stylized star or swirl
powers.effect: Nachia also receives 50% of the healing from Moonlight Pact's cast effect
powers.bonus: Nachia receives 50% of Moonlight Pact's cast healing

powers.name: Lone Wolf
powers.icon_description: White crescent moon icon facing right
powers.effect: You can no longer cast Moonlight Pact, but Fenrir's Armor increases by 60 and his basic attack damage increases by 30%
powers.bonus: Fenrir's Armor +60, Fenrir's basic attack damage +30%
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Nachia, costs 120 gems

powers.name: Fetch!
powers.icon_description: Small white stylized icon resembling crossed bones or tools
powers.effect: Targets also gain Movement Speed equal to 80% of the Attack Speed bonus from Nature's Whisper
powers.bonus: Movement Speed equal to 80% of Attack Speed bonus
powers.scaling: 80% of Nature's Whisper Attack Speed bonus

powers.name: Nature's Command
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon resembling bird or wing
powers.effect: Nature's Whisper instantly teleports summons to the target location
powers.modification: Instantly teleports summons to target location

powers.name: Micro-managing
powers.icon_description: White stylized four-pointed star or compass rose icon with central circle
powers.effect: Nature's Whisper's cooldown is reduced by 80%, but the Attack Speed bonus is also reduced by 50%
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Nachia, costs 120 gems

powers.name: Merciful Blessing
powers.icon_description: Glowing white icon resembling stylized leaf or feather
powers.effect: Increases the duration of Serpent's Blessing by 4 seconds

powers.name: Serpent's Love
powers.icon_description: White stylized icon depicting two intertwined snakes forming heart shape
powers.effect: Serpent's Blessing's Attack Speed bonus increases by 50%, but it no longer buffs yourself when targeting an ally
powers.penalty: No longer buffs yourself when targeting an ally

powers.name: Immortal Protection
powers.icon_description: Glowing white stylized icon resembling censer or tripod with smoke or energy rising from it
powers.effect: When an ally affected by Serpent's Blessing would take lethal damage, the blessing is immediately removed instead and they recover 50% of their Maximum Health
powers.trigger: Ally affected by Serpent's Blessing would take lethal damage
powers.unlock_requirement: Mastery level 25 with Nachia, costs 120 gems

notes.common_powers_note: Purchased common stars can be used by all travelers
notes.flexible_special_note: Flexible stars can be equipped in any slot without efficiency loss. Any socketable power can be placed in Flexible slots, and Flexible powers can be placed in any category slot.
